alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued March 26 at 1:38PM CDT until March 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS EXTENDED SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 86 TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING AREAS UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA GENEVA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, BARKER STORE, BONIFAY, BROWNTOWN, CENTER RIDGE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COTTONWOOD, CRYSTAL LAKE, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DOTHAN, EUCHEEANNA, FADETTE, FIVE POINTS, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GRACEVILLE, HACODA, HARTFORD, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, LEONIA, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, MALONE, MARIANNA, NEW HOPE, ORANGE HILL, POPLAR HEAD, RICHTER CROSSROADS, SIMSVILLE, AND SNEADS.
